Monitoring transition talk - an introduction

An introduction to the full talk below

Formats: Summary

Date: 07 Apr 2015

Monitoring transition - full talk

Everyone talks the benefits of having an automated monitoring system in place - one which can discover infrastructure components as they are added, monitor them while they are alive and stop monitoring when they are moved out. But no one has chronicled their journey through the process of automating a manually maintained monitoring system and showcased their battle scars for others to learn from. Thatâ€™s what we are going to talk about.
